item.title: My Love-Hate Relationship with Copy & Paste
item.description: This may come as a shock to my fellow developers, but I’m not a big fan of copying and pasting code. Hot takes aside, I recognise that the copy-paste functionality is a useful tool, which no developer should have to live without, but I’ve noticed a trend among my peers that concerns me.
